Name: Goblin Quest: Escape!
About the game: The game Goblin Quest: Escape! is an award-winning action-packed dungeon crawler, action-rpg and reverse tower defense hybrid from BotBite Industries. The Evil Wizard has created a dungeon full of traps to store his treasure. And who's gonna test it? You, of course! Run away from enemies, dodge the shots of the towers, collect loot, upgrade your outfit and escape the dungeon! Features As a weak goblin you canâ€™t attack your enemies but you can outrun or outsmart them. Collect Gold to buy items. Get all the Gems to buy clothes that give you permanent buffs. Upgrade your items and clothes for better stats that help your survival. Controls An Xbox 360 controller is recommended for the game. Mouse and keyboard controls are also fully supported.
